A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They have butchered a legacy. The story was weak and the acting was over the top in some areas and then poor in others. The Directors have not enhanced what George Lucas had mastered. Being a very big fan... I have to say this was incredibly disappointing. Some of the action scenes were great and others well.... they were messy and didn't make use of a Jedi's powers. I just hope the finally movie in 2019 doesn't leave hardcore fans with an awful taste in their mouths and has a story line that actually makes sense.
